title: exdigis
author: exdigis
created_time: July 16, 2023, 01:29:54 PMLast edit: July 16, 2023, 01:45:38 PM by exdigis
content: Looking for quality work. Please PM links to examples of your work as well as price ballpark figures.The landing page will need to have its CSS contain two themes (dark and light), using the var(-- ...) variables.I'm not looking for a lot of art - it will be the landing page of a crypto exchange service. All art must be original.Looking forward to seeing some amazing offers :-)

comments.author: tabas
comments.body: This list: Overview of Bitcointalk Designers(Signature,Avatar,etc) consists of designers. They're not just signature designers but some of them are also logo makers and web designers. I have no idea if the designers on this list are still active but some of them are no longer. The links of their threads are already there, you can check each of them and contact the designer you'll choose.
